articles.title: ‘I was run-down’: Brad Crouch explains why he had to leave Adelaide - Fox Sports
articles.description: New St Kilda midfielder Brad Crouch says he was “run-down” at Adelaide and frustrated at the way the side was playing during the 2020 season, adding he needed a fresh start at a “successful team”.

articles.title: Players agree to 6 per cent cut in new pay deal - NRL.COM
articles.description: The NRL's elite representative players will sacrifice a collective $3 million in Origin payments to ensure their minimum wage counterparts do not have their salaries impacted by a reduced salary cap.
